description.zh-cn: 明朝徐王，明兴宗朱标的第五子，母为吕太后。建文帝失位后，被其叔明成祖降为敷惠王，后改封瓯宁王。永乐四年因宫邸火灾被烧死。
description.en: Prince of Xu of the Ming Dynasty, the fifth son of Crown Prince Zhu Biao (Emperor Xingzong) and Empress Lü. After the Jianwen Emperor lost the throne, he was demoted to Prince Fuhui and later enfeoffed as Prince Ouning by his uncle, the Yongle Emperor. He died in a palace fire in 1406.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋长子，明朝第一位皇太子，明成祖之兄。朱允熙、建文帝、朱允熥、朱允熞的父亲。
description.en: The eldest son of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang, the first crown prince of the Ming Dynasty, and the elder brother of the Yongle Emperor. He was the father of Zhu Yunxi, the Jianwen Emperor, Zhu Yunteng, and Zhu Yunjian.

description.zh-cn: 明兴宗朱标的次妃，朱允熙的生母。
description.en: The secondary consort of Crown Prince Zhu Biao (Emperor Xingzong) and the biological mother of Zhu Yunxi.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，朱标之子，朱允熙的兄长。在靖难之役中被其叔朱棣推翻。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming Dynasty, son of Zhu Biao and elder brother of Zhu Yunxi. He was overthrown by his uncle Zhu Di in the Jingnan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，朱元璋第四子，朱标之弟。通过靖难之役从侄子建文帝手中夺取皇位。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the fourth son of the Hongwu Emperor and younger brother of Zhu Biao. He seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, in the Jingnan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 朱标之子，朱允熙的兄长。被明成祖废为庶人。
description.en: Son of Zhu Biao and elder brother of Zhu Yunxi. He was demoted to a commoner by the Yongle Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱标之子，朱允熙的兄长。被明成祖废为庶人。
description.en: Son of Zhu Biao and elder brother of Zhu Yunxi. He was demoted to a commoner by the Yongle Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝，朱允熙的祖父。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, grandfather of Zhu Yunxi.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的皇后，朱允熙的祖母。
description.en: The empress of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang, grandmother of Zhu Yunxi.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，官至太常卿，吕太后之父。
description.en: A Ming dynasty official who served as Minister of the Court of Imperial Sacrifices and was the father of Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 南明第一位皇帝，追复朱允熙为徐王，并追谥。
description.en: The first emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty, who posthumously restored Zhu Yunxi as Prince of Xu and granted him a posthumous name.

description.zh-cn: 南明第二位皇帝，追谥朱允熙为“愍”。
description.en: The second emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty, who posthumously named Zhu Yunxi 'Min'.

description.zh-cn: 导致朱允熙死亡的宫邸火灾事件。
description.en: The palace fire incident that led to the death of Zhu Yunxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱允熙是朱标的第五子。
description.en: Zhu Yunxi is the fifth son of Zhu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 朱允熙的生母是吕太后。
description.en: Zhu Yunxi's biological mother is Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 吕氏是朱标的继妃。
description.en: Lady Lü was the secondary consort of Zhu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 朱允熙是建文帝的弟弟。
description.en: Zhu Yunxi is the younger brother of the Jianwen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱允熙和朱允熥是兄弟关系。
description.en: Zhu Yunxi and Zhu Yunteng are brothers.

description.zh-cn: 朱允熙和朱允熞是兄弟关系。
description.en: Zhu Yunxi and Zhu Yunjian are brothers.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝失位后，明成祖将朱允熙降为敷惠王。
description.en: After the Jianwen Emperor lost his throne, the Yongle Emperor demoted Zhu Yunxi to Prince Fuhui.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖改封朱允熙为瓯宁王，以承奉其父朱标的祭祀。
description.en: The Yongle Emperor re-enfeoffed Zhu Yunxi as Prince of Ouning to continue the sacrificial rites for his father, Zhu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖将广泽王朱允熥废为庶人。
description.en: The Yongle Emperor demoted Zhu Yunteng, Prince of Guangze, to a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖将怀恩王朱允熞废为庶人。
description.en: The Yongle Emperor demoted Zhu Yunjian, Prince of Huai'en, to a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖通过靖难之役夺取了侄子建文帝的皇位。
description.en: The Yongle Emperor seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, through the Jingnan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 朱标是朱元璋的儿子。
description.en: Zhu Biao is the son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱标是孝慈高皇后的儿子。
description.en: Zhu Biao is the son of Empress Xiaocigao.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋与孝慈高皇后是夫妻关系。
description.en: The Hongwu Emperor and Empress Xiaocigao were husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 吕太后是吕本的女儿。
description.en: Empress Lü is the daughter of Lü Ben.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖是朱标的弟弟。
description.en: The Yongle Emperor is the younger brother of Zhu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 南明弘光帝追复朱允熙为徐王，并追谥为“哀”或“简”。
description.en: The Southern Ming Hongguang Emperor posthumously restored Zhu Yunxi as Prince of Xu and granted him the posthumous name 'Ai' or 'Jian'.

description.zh-cn: 南明隆武帝追谥朱允熙为“愍”。
description.en: The Southern Ming Longwu Emperor posthumously named Zhu Yunxi 'Min'.

description.zh-cn: 朱允熙因其宫邸发生的火灾而被烧死。
description.en: Zhu Yunxi was burned to death in a fire at his palace.
